name: play-component-commonjs
description: Playing with CommonJS UI components with optional jQuery plugin API
author: Tim Welch

scripts.build-dev: browserify js/index.js --debug --standalone dots > dist/dots.js && parcelify js/index.js -c dist/dots.css
scripts.build-min: browserify js/mapbox-gl.js --debug --plugin [minifyify --map mapbox-gl.js.map --output dist/mapbox-gl.js.map] --standalone mapboxgl > dist/mapbox-gl.js && tap --no-coverage test/build/min.test.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run lint && browserify test/index.js | smokestack -b firefox | tap-status
